segments.text: We should know by next month whom to hire . If your application is successful , we'll notify you by mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll give you our decision in 7 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I hope to hear from you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please send the next candidate in on your way out .
segments.speaker: S1
